progetto.view.gui

Class EndGamePaneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.view.gui.AbstractStateController
      • progetto.view.gui.EndGamePaneController

  • public class EndGamePaneController
extends AbstractStateController
    this is the class that handles the choose end game fxml. This class is only instanced by javafx, this mean that must have a default constructor.
    Author:
    Federica
